snippet: A federal court ordered that three men convicted in 2004 of smuggling sea bass and rock lobster make the restitution to South Africa.
abstract: Arnold Bengis, David Bengis and Jeffrey Noll, convicted in 2004 of smuggling sea bass and rock lobster from South Africa, are ordered by a federal court to pay that nation $22.5 million in restitution, largest amount ever awarded for such a crime.
lead_paragraph: A federal court ordered that three men convicted in 2004 of smuggling sea bass and rock lobster make the restitution to South Africa.
